dsiter.row

Interface IColumnAccessor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRowAccessor
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IColumnAccessor.BOOLEAN, IColumnAccessor.DOUBLE, IColumnAccessor.FLOAT, IColumnAccessor.INT, IColumnAccessor.JSDATE, IColumnAccessor.LONG, IColumnAccessor.STRING

    public interface IColumnAccessor
extends IRowAccessor
    An extension of IRowAccessor for implementations that simply access a Column within a Row and return that value. The only addition to the base interface is the getIndex() method which returns the type-specific index at which the column's value can be found (similar to ColumnDescriptor.getRowArrayIndex()). When possible, it is usually cleaner to use the super-type IRowAccessor unless you really need to use the getIndex() method (occasionally useful for copying IColumnAccessor instances, etc).

    Like IRowAccessor, this interface defines inner interfaces that are type-specific versions of itself, and extend the type-specific version of IRowAccessor. For example, IColumnAccessor.INT extends IRowAccessor.INT and therefore requires both getIndex() and IRowAccessor.INT.getIntFromRow(Row) to be defined.

    Although this is an interface, concrete type-specific instances can be obtained via getInstance(ColumnType, int). It is unlikely that implementors will want to extend this interface themselves, instead simply using the types returned by getInstance(...)

    • Method Detail

      • getIndex

        int getIndex()
        Get the type-specific index at which this column's value can be accessed.
        Returns:
        The index at which this column can be accessed, within the Row's type-appropriate array.
        See Also:
        ColumnDescriptor.getRowArrayIndex()

      • getInstance

        static IColumnAccessor getInstance(ColumnType type,
                                   int index)
        Get a type-specific instance of IColumnAccessor. The column's value will be read from the index-th position of the type-appropriate array in the Row
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the column
        index - The index at which to read the column's value
        Returns:
        An appropriately-typed instance of IColumnAccessor
